workflowInfo.workflowDescription: Allocate a new Local Page Dataset with an option to add it dynamically to the system

variable.name: pageName
variable.label: Page DSN
variable.abstract: New Local Page dataset to be allocated
variable.description: New Local Page Dataset to be allocated. To get your naming convention you can use D ASM MVS command.

variable.name: volume
variable.label: VOLSER
variable.description: Volume Serial Name where the new Local Page Dataset is allocated

variable.name: volSpace
variable.label: Volume type
variable.description: You can select volume type to allocate new page set. Maximum space allowed for the volume is used.

variable.name: usrSpace
variable.label: User Space
variable.description: If you specify space allocation here, the volume type above is ignored.

variable.name: add
variable.label: Add dynamically
variable.abstract: Add new Page Space dynamically to the system
variable.description: Decides if you want to add newly allocated Local Page Space to the system.

step.name: submitJCL
step.title: Allocate/add new Local Page Dataset
step.description:
Allocate new Local Page Dataset

The new Page Space can be dynamically added to the system

The Workflow is used to allocate a new Local Page Dataset on a specified volume.

You need to provide, Local Page Dataset name, space in Cylinders. (or select a volume type)

In case no user space is selected, the space is allocated as a maximum allowed for the volume type.



When the Workflow completes, check the output in DD called RESULT.



In case of questions please send an email to miroslav_kubik@cz.ibm.com
step.instructions: Do not forget to fill in all variables!
